page.title: 04PENRITH HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: Opened Dec.1983,brings various health care facilities under one roof.2 main wings,bridged by a dispensing pharmacy Surgery wing accommodates 3{general } {practicioner}groups.Group A:3 doctors; Group B:3 doctors;Group C:7 doctors +1 trainee G.P.All practices are run in a similar way but are independent,& employ auxiliary staff in relation to size.Group C cares for{12,000 patients & employs 2 nurses (dressings and injections)5 district nurses,2 health visitors,4 receptionists,3 secretaries & 1 computer operator.{Surgery}has 8 consulting rooms,2 treatment rooms,1 clinical room for eye examinations, patients' waiting room and staff rest rooms.{Pharmacy}is indepently run by 3 pharmacists.{Clinic}wing has facilities for{Chiropody, Dental, {Hearing & Speech clinics, school nurse {& physiotherapy.}Staff are peripatic.
